# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8.8 FATAL_ERROR)
SET(VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR "/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/include")
SET(VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR "/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/lib")
SET(VISIT_BINARY_DIR "/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/bin")
SET(VISIT_ARCHIVE_DIR "/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/archives")
SET(VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR "/home/wink/.visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/plugins")
INCLUDE("/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/include/PluginVsInstall.cmake")
INCLUDE("/opt/visit/2.12.0/linux-x86_64/include/VisItLibraryDependencies.cmake")

PROJECT(nn1stsd_database)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
nn1stsdPluginInfo.C
nn1stsdCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
nn1stsdPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
nn1stsdMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtnn1stsdFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
nn1stsdEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtnn1stsdFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit/visit_vtk/lightweight
${EAVL_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTKM_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${EAVL_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTKM_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(Inn1stsdDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Inn1stsdDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS Inn1stsdDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(Mnn1stsdDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Mnn1stsdDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Mnn1stsdDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Mnn1stsdDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(Enn1stsdDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Enn1stsdDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Enn1stsdDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Enn1stsdDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(Enn1stsdDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Enn1stsdDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(Enn1stsdDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} Enn1stsdDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
